channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: Biden's EPA dismisses dozens of Trump-appointed science advisors
item.description: The agency is looking for 'the best possible scientific insight to support our work.'

item.title: Watch the trailer for 'Zola,' a Twitter thread turned motion picture
item.description: A24 has shared the first trailer for Zola, a movie that is based on a now-infamous 148-part Twitter thread from 2015.

item.title: Xbox cloud gaming adds 'Morrowind' and other backwards compatible titles
item.description: Microsoft is adding original Xbox and Xbox 360 titles to its Xbox cloud gaming service.

item.title: Glastonbury Festival will livestream a concert series for the first time
item.description: The Glastonbury Festival is holding its first livestreamed event on May 22nd, with big groups like Coldplay and Haim in the lineup.

item.title: This powerful 1080p mini projector is on sale for just $280
item.description: The PIQO is a pocket-sized projector that offers a bright 200-lumen bulb, five hours of battery life and built-in speakers.

item.title: 'No Man's Sky' adds seasonal missions in its latest update
item.description: Hello Games is bringing more structure to your adventures.

item.title: Online advertisers take on Google with their own third-party cookie alternative
item.description: Online advertisers have come up with their own ad tracking alternative to Google's FLoC.

item.title: Another state has failed in its attempt at app store reform
item.description: Arizona's app store competition bill has failed after the state Senate pulled the measure.

item.title: Porsche will offer Android Auto in new cars beginning with 2022 models
item.description: Porsche is finally offering Android Auto with new cars, starting with 2022 models like the refreshed 911.

item.title: Facebook makes it easier for users to see News Feed stories in chronological order
item.description: Facebook is rolling out a News Feed update that lets you switch off algorithmically-ranked posts in favor of a chronological timeline.

item.title: Niantic's new 5G game demo highlights the future of AR gaming
item.description: Niantic has unveiled a new multiplayer AR demo game that it says can handle up to ten times more simultaneous players on 5G.

item.title: There's a Google-branded Fiat 500 range now
item.description: Fiat has launched special edition versions of its 500 lineup of cars with an unusual partner: Google.

item.title: The Morning After: SpaceX lost another Starship prototype
item.description: Today’s headlines: Xiaomi's first foldable phone has a shape-shifting 'liquid lens' camera, Volkswagen's 'Voltswagen' rebranding is just an April Fool's stunt and what is happening to SpaceX’s prototype Starships?

item.title: CD Projekt Red is 'reconsidering' Cyberpunk 2077 multiplayer
item.description: 'Cyberpunk 2077' studio CD Projekt Red says it's reconsidering a multiplayer mode for the sci-fi game as it focuses on bringing online elements to all its franchises.

item.title: Hyundai imagines an EV future where cars 'crab drive' sideways to park
item.description: Every urban mobility EV concept needs some kind of fun gimmick, and Hyundai has delivered quite a few with its latest Mobis M.Vision concepts.

item.title: Spotify's new personalized mixes focus on artists, genres and decades
item.description: Starting today, all free and premium Spotify users will be able access three new personalized mixes inspired by Daily Mix.

item.title: WhatsApp payments get approved by Brazil's central bank
item.description: Brazil's central bank has approved peer-to-peer payments for the Facebook—owned messaging service, allowing users to send money to each other with cards issued by Visa and Mastercard.

item.title: Amazon's Deal of the Day cuts SSD and hard drive prices by up to 48 percent
item.description: Storage discounts are few and far between these days, but Amazon is offering discounts of up to 48 percent on SSDs and hard drives right now as part of its Deal of the Day.

item.title: Wisk will start testing its 'air taxi' implementation later this year
item.description: This electric VTOL-capable drone is taking another step toward tests with passengers in New Zealand.

item.title: Apple's upcoming iOS update unblocks 'Asian' as adult content
item.description: According to Mashable, the latest iOS 14.5 Beta's adult content filter no longer blocks searches containing the word "Asian."

item.title: Apple Maps adds information on COVID-19 measures at airports
item.description: Apple is adding a small but handy feature for those who need to travel during the pandemic.

item.title: The new 'Mortal Kombat' movie has been delayed one more week
item.description: The 'Mortal Kombat' movie premieres in theaters and on HBO Max on April 23rd.

item.title: Gocycle's G4 e-bikes come with more powerful motors and wider tires
item.description: Gocycle its signature electric bike to add a new, more powerful motor, a redesigned carbon fork and wider tires for better comfort.

item.title: 'Amnesia: Rebirth' gets an exploratory mode that makes the game less scary
item.description: We might actually finish the game now.

item.title: Volkswagen's 'Voltswagen' rebranding is just an April Fool's stunt
item.description: Despite what you may have heard, Volkswagen is still going to be called Volkswagen. We'll explain.
